cross: Cymbidium Lotza Spots Ã— Cymbidium Reds Meadow

measurements.description: Eight flowers on one 76-cm inflorescence; sepals and petals pale yellow, blushed brick distally, dark burgundy spots and markings; lip pale yellow, picotee, heavily overlaid uneven dark burgundy-red blotches; column pale yellow, blushed and overlaid dark burgundy, dark burgundy spots, anther cap pale yellow, small burgundy markings; substance very hard; texture matte.
